parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering shaft can cause the loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels loose or wobbly
the steering wheel rocks from side to side
the steering wheel has excessive play
the steering shaft breaks or separates
the vehicle wanders or drifts while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the loss of steering assist, making it difficult to control the vehicle, especially at low speeds, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel is hard to turn
the vehicle is difficult to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tie rod can cause the loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: the vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
the steering wheel feels loose or wobbly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake lines can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Brake pedal goes to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake rotors can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
The failure of the brake hardware can cause the loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: wheel binding against the brake assembly.
